definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: pt. of [[יתר]])—abs. [[יוֹתֵר]] Ec 7:16 + 2 t.; [[יׁתֵר]] Ec 2:15 + 4 t.;—superiority, advantage [[מַה־יּוֹתֵר לֶחָכָם מִן־הַכְּסִיל]] Ec 6:8 what advantage hath the wise over the fool? prob. also [[יׁתֵר מֵהֵמָּה]] Ec 12:12 (as to) what is more than these (see VB); abs. [[מַה־יּׁתֵר לָאָדָם]] Ec 6:11; [[יׂתֵר לְרׂאֵי]] [[הַשָָּׁמֶשׁ]] Ec 7:11; elsewh. adv. to excess, overmuch Ec 2:15, Ec 7:16; sq. [[מִן]] (as oft. in NH), [[יוֹתֵר מִמֶּנִּי]] Es 6:6 more than me; ´[[יׁתֵר שֶׁ]] = besides that Ec 12:9.
